books.bookDescription: Violet Sorrengail is urged by the commanding general, who also is her mother, to become a candidate for the elite dragon riders.
The second book in the Empyrean series. Violet Sorrengail’s next round of training under the new vice commandant might require her to betray the man she loves.
Troubles surface when a woman looking to make a fresh start takes a job in the home of the Winchesters.
The second book in the Holmes, Margaret & Poe series. A series of child abductions perplexes the private investigators.
A reimagining of “Adventures of Huckleberry Finn” shines a different light on Mark Twain's classic, revealing new facets of the character of Jim.
In 1965, a nursing student follows her brother to serve during the Vietnam War and returns to a divided America.
A woman reeling from her husband’s infidelity and the loss of her job meets a well-known actor in the French countryside.
In Maine, 1789, a midwife seeks to uncover the true cause of the death of a man discovered entombed in the Kennebec River.
When a 13-year-old girl disappears from an Adirondack summer camp in 1975, secrets kept by the Van Laar family emerge.
The third book in the When in Rome series. Two feuding second-grade teachers form an alliance that may lead to more.
Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
The 38th book in the Carpathian series. Will Benedek and Silke defeat an adversary bent on destruction?

books.bookTitle: A COURT OF THORNS AND ROSES

books.bookDescription: A memoir by the cookbook author and Food Network host known as the Barefoot Contessa.
In the first part of her memoir, the multiple award-winning pop culture icon traces her childhood and forays into the world of entertainment.
The author of “Braiding Sweetgrass” illuminates how the gift economy in the natural world works and draws lessons for our economy; with illustrations by John Burgoyne.
Our criminal justice system viewed through the struggles of 10 wrongfully convicted people to achieve exoneration.
The Academy Award-winning actor shares snippets from the diaries he kept over the last 35 years.
The author of “The Splendid and the Vile” portrays the months between the election of Abraham Lincoln and the beginning of the Civil War.
The former and future first lady describes her work as a fashion model, marriage to Donald Trump and time in the White House.
Essays and drawings by the author of “The Joy Luck Club” and “The Bonesetter's Daughter,” which depict a search for peace through birding.
A look at recent scientific research on aging and longevity.
Through a series of stories, Gladwell explicates the causes of various kinds of epidemics.
The conservative commentator evaluates the legacies of American presidents.

After the passing of their father, seemingly different brothers engage in relationships and seek ways to cope.

books.bookTitle: ALL THE COLORS OF THE DARK
books.bookDescription: Questions arise when a boy saves the daughter of a wealthy family amid a string of disappearances in a Missouri town in 1975.

books.bookTitle: THE LIFE CYCLE OF THE COMMON OCTOPUS
books.bookDescription: A student at the University of Edinburgh falls in love and uncovers her divorced parents’ secret.
When a valuable artifact goes missing during the Met Gala in 1978, a curator must confront demons from her past in Egypt.
A widow working the night shift at the Sowell Bay Aquarium is aided in solving a mystery by a giant Pacific octopus living there.
A man in search of the father he never knew encounters a single mom and rumors circulate of the nearby appearance of a white deer.

books.bookTitle: THE GIRL WHO DRANK THE MOON
books.bookDescription: A young girl is accidentally fed moonlight instead of starlight, which gives her magical powers. A fantastical adventure unfolds.
A gripping tale of survival as two young whales set off on an adventure to rescue their family from danger.
Percy Jackson introduces readers to the fascinating world of Greek mythology with humor and insight.
A mysterious and magical tale about puppets that come to life, secrets, and friendship.

books.bookTitle: IF HE HAD BEEN WITH ME
books.bookDescription: A heart-wrenching story about love, loss, and the regrets that come with the choices we make in life.
A fun and heartwarming romantic comedy about a high school girl who gets caught up in her own romantic fantasies.

books.bookTitle: IF ONLY I HAD TOLD HER
books.bookDescription: A story of missed opportunities and the painful consequences of not sharing your feelings.
A poignant and powerful story about a young girl overcoming personal struggles and finding hope in unlikely places.
A thriller about a group of friends whose night of partying leads to unexpected consequences.
A romantic comedy about taking chances, learning to trust, and following your heart.
A dark fantasy filled with twists and turns, focusing on love, betrayal, and survival.
A touching love story about the power of first loves and unforgettable moments.
